product_title:
LE ROUGE CRAYON DE COULEUR
JUMBO LONGWEAR LIP CRAYON
product_description:
What it is: An easy-to-apply lipstick that delivers lasting, full-coverage color and a satiny shine in a smooth, comfortable texture.
What it does: The twist-up retractable crayon offers convenient on-the-go shading and impeccable touch-ups.
How to use: Use the tip of the crayon to define lips, then shade and fill in with the flat side.
- 0.04 oz.
Item # 5308883
